sourcesContent:
<template>
  <input :value="modelValue1"
         @input="updateInput"
         type="text" class="input" >
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "my-input",
  props:{
    modelValue1:[String, Number],
  },
  methods: {
    updateInput(event){
        this.$emit('update:modelValue1', event.target.value)
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

.input {
  width: 100%;
  border: 1px solid teal;
  padding: 10px 15px;
  margin-top: 15px;
}
</style>
